#summary General usage infos.
#labels Featured

== Rotary encoder ==
|| *Encoder*    || *Function*     ||
|| Left/right   || Scroll up/down ||
|| Normal press || Select/Enter   ||
|| Long press   || Back/Abort     ||


== IR remote control (RC5) ==
|| *Button*     || *Function*     ||
|| 2x Power     || Standby on/off ||
|| Volume +/-   || Volume control and in menu scroll page up/down ||
|| Up/down      || Scroll up/down ||
|| OK           || Select/Enter   ||


== Bootloader ==
The new firmware has to be copied to the root directory of the memory card and named * FIRMWARE.BIN *. Then start the loader: Hold the rotary encoder switch while power on the WebRadio. Now you see the loader menu...


== Webinterface ==
Type in your browser * http://192.168.0.50 * or * http://webradio * to access the webinterface. (These are the default addresses.)


=== Ethernet settings ===
If DHCP is on and the DHCP request fails then the network settings are used from the _settings.ini_ file. If options are not found then the default settings are used.

Default settings:
{{{
  Name           WEBRADIO
  MAC            00:01:23:45:67:89
  DHCP           1
  IP             192.168.000.050
  NetMask        255.255.255.000
  Router         192.168.000.001
  DNS            192.168.000.001
  NTP            078.046.194.189 (0.de.pool.ntp.org)
  TimeDiff       3600
  Summer         0
}}}
